ThingDef.label: Fur Poncho
ThingDef.description: Wrap yourself in frontier luxury with this warm and rugged poncho. Perfect for chilly nights under the stars or making a statement in town.

ThingDef.label: Pinkerton Hat

ThingDef.label: Armadillo

ThingDef.label: Frontiersman Outfit
